amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase funds for hazardous fuels management activities by $10 million, decrease funds provided for forest products by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carbajal amendment (A034) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Carbajal.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Carbajal amendment (A034) Failed by voice vote.
